Uses of Package
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces

Packages that use info.oais.infomodel.interfaces
Package
Description
info.oais.infomodel.implementation
 
info.oais.infomodel.interfaces
 
  • Classes in info.oais.infomodel.interfaces used by info.oais.infomodel.implementation
    Class
    Description
    AccessRightsInformation
    The information that identifies the access restrictions pertaining to the Content Data Object, including the legal framework, licensing terms, and access control.
    ArchivalInformationPackage
    An Information Package, consisting of the Content Information and the associated Preservation Description Information (PDI), which is preserved within an OAIS.
    BaseGroup
    General Group of InformationObjects.
    ContextInformation
    The information that documents the relationships of the Content Data Object to its environment.
    DataObject
    Either a Physical Object or a Digital Object.
    DigitalObject
    An object composed of a set of bit sequences.
    FixityInformation
    The information which documents the mechanisms that ensure that the Content Data Object has not been altered in an undocumented manner.
    Identifier
    An identifier is a name that identifies (that is, labels the identity of) either a unique object or a unique class of objects, where the "object" or class may be an idea, physical countable object (or class thereof), or physical noncountable substance (or class thereof).
    InformationObject
    An Information Object is a Data Object together with its Representation Information [OAIS] Information: Any type of knowledge that can be exchanged.
    InformationPackage
    A logical container composed of optional Information Object(s).
    PackageDescription
    The information intended for use by Access Aids.
    PackagingInformation
    The information that describes how the components of an Information Package are logically or physically bound together and how to identify and extract the components.
    PreservationDescriptionInformation
    The information, which along with Representation Information, is necessary for adequate preservation of the Content Data Object and which can be categorized as Provenance Information, Context Information, Reference Information, Fixity Information, and Access Rights Information.
    ProvenanceInformation
    The information that documents the history of the Content Data Object.
    ReferenceInformation
    The information that is used as an identifier for the Content Data Object.
    RepInfoCategory
    A classification of RepInfo to facilitate locating the kind of RepInfo wanted.
    RepresentationInformation
    The information that maps a Data Object into more meaningful concepts so that the Data Object may be understood in ways exemplified by Preservation Objectives.
  • Classes in info.oais.infomodel.interfaces used by info.oais.infomodel.interfaces
    Class
    Description
    AccessRightsInformation
    The information that identifies the access restrictions pertaining to the Content Data Object, including the legal framework, licensing terms, and access control.
    AcyclicDirectedGraph
    This interface provides methods which can be used to navigate a RepInfoNetwork.
    ArchivalInformationPackage
    An Information Package, consisting of the Content Information and the associated Preservation Description Information (PDI), which is preserved within an OAIS.
    BaseGroup
    General Group of InformationObjects.
    CollectionDescription
    A type of Package Description that is specialized to provide information about an Archival Information Collection (or an Access Collection) for use by Access Aids [OAIS].
    ContextInformation
    The information that documents the relationships of the Content Data Object to its environment.
    DataObject
    Either a Physical Object or a Digital Object.
    FixityInformation
    The information which documents the mechanisms that ensure that the Content Data Object has not been altered in an undocumented manner.
    Identifier
    An identifier is a name that identifies (that is, labels the identity of) either a unique object or a unique class of objects, where the "object" or class may be an idea, physical countable object (or class thereof), or physical noncountable substance (or class thereof).
    InformationObject
    An Information Object is a Data Object together with its Representation Information [OAIS] Information: Any type of knowledge that can be exchanged.
    InformationPackage
    A logical container composed of optional Information Object(s).
    PackageDescription
    The information intended for use by Access Aids.
    PackagingInformation
    The information that describes how the components of an Information Package are logically or physically bound together and how to identify and extract the components.
    PersistentIdentifier
    A long-lasting Identifier.
    PreservationDescriptionInformation
    The information, which along with Representation Information, is necessary for adequate preservation of the Content Data Object and which can be categorized as Provenance Information, Context Information, Reference Information, Fixity Information, and Access Rights Information.
    ProvenanceInformation
    The information that documents the history of the Content Data Object.
    ReferenceInformation
    The information that is used as an identifier for the Content Data Object.
    RepInfoCategory
    A classification of RepInfo to facilitate locating the kind of RepInfo wanted.
    RepInfoGroup
    Group of RepresentationInformation, which includes the associated classification.
    RepresentationInformation
    The information that maps a Data Object into more meaningful concepts so that the Data Object may be understood in ways exemplified by Preservation Objectives.
    RootVertex
    The unique root Vertex of the acyclic directed graph.
